English: Thanks. The boss won't get mad at me now.
Chinese:
得救了，謝謝。
這樣就不會挨店長罵了。
Korean:
덕분에 살았어, 고마워.
이걸로 점장한테 안 혼나겠다
German: Danke. Jetzt wird der Chef nicht wütend auf mich.

English:
Huh? The boss sent you? All the deliveries are
late?
Chinese:
什麼？你是店長派來的？
所有送貨員都超過到貨時間了？
Korean:
응? 너, 점장이 말해서 왔어?
배달원이 전부 일이 늦어져서?
German:
Was? Der Chef hat dich geschickt? Alle Lieferungen
sind spät dran?

English:
So someone's interfering with the others, too?
I don't know who it is, but it's really annoying.
Chinese:
……該不會，除了我以外的送貨員也受到妨礙了吧？
到底是誰在做這種事啊。有夠麻煩的。
Korean:
…그럼 나 이외의 배달원도 누군가의 방해를 받는 걸까?
대체 누가 그런 짓을 하는 걸까? 참 민폐야
German:
Jemand behindert auch die anderen? Ich weiß nicht,
wer es ist, aber es nervt wirklich.

English:
You want to know if WereGarurumon offered me a
job? How did you know about that?
Chinese:
什麼？你說獸人加魯魯的店有沒有找我挖角？
你怎麼會知道這件事？
Korean:
어? 워가루몬의 가게로 오라는 권유를 받았냐고?
그걸 어떻게 알았어?
German:
Du willst wissen, ob WereGarurumon mir einen Job
angeboten hat? Woher weißt du davon?

English: He did, but I declined. I owe my boss.
Chinese:
雖然有找過我，但是我拒絕了。
現在的店長對我有恩。
Korean:
권유는 받았지만, 스카우트는 거절했어.
지금 점장한테는 은혜를 입은 게 있어서
German:
Das stimmt, aber ich habe abgelehnt. Ich schulde
meinem Chef was.

English:
You don't think WereGarurumon could be behind it,
do you?
Chinese: 該不會，你要說這是那傢伙做的吧？
Korean: 혹시, 이거 그 녀석이 한 짓인 건가?
German:
Du glaubst doch nicht etwa, dass WereGarurumon
dahintersteckt, oder?

English:
WereGarurumon, get out of my way! I'll be late for
my delivery!
Chinese:
獸人加魯魯，你快讓開啦～
這樣下去，我送貨要來不急了啊～
Korean:
워가루몬, 거기서 비켜~
이대로는 배달 시간을 못 맞춰~
German:
WereGarurumon, aus dem Weg! Ich bin mit meiner
Lieferung spät dran!

English:
That was DemiDevimon's voice. It sounds like
WereGarurumon's up to something!
Chinese:
這聲音，是小惡魔獸！
他說獸人加魯魯……那個，該不會是！
Korean:
지금 목소리, 동료인 피코데블몬이야!
워가루몬이라니……있잖아, 혹시!
German:
Das war die Stimme von DemiDevimon. Es scheint,
als ob WereGarurumon etwas im Schilde führt!
